    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book(Book other)
        Copy constructor for Book object.
        Parameters:
        other - book to be copied

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String author,
            int year,
            int num)
        Constructs a new Book object. If year is not valid it will be set to default 2000. If number of pages is not valid it will be set to default 1. _borrowed field is set to false. All other fields are set to null.
        Parameters:
        title - book title
        author - book author
        year - the year the book was published param num book number of pages

        d - borrow date

      • computePenalty

        public int computePenalty(Date d)
        Computes penalty given return date.
        Parameters:
        d - return date
        Returns:
        penalty if book is borrowed and student is late; 0 otherwise.

      • howLongBorrowed

        public int howLongBorrowed(Date d)
        Gets today's date and if book is borrowed returns how many days the book is borrowed; otherwise returns 0.
        Parameters:
        d - today's date
        Returns:
        how many days the book is borrowed

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(Date d)
        Checks if book is available.
        Parameters:
        d - today's date
        Returns:
        false if the book is borrowed; otherwise if book is not borrowed returns false if today's day is Friday or Saturday; otherwise returns true

      • returnBook

        public boolean returnBook(Date d)
        Gets return date and updates the appropriate book attributes.
        Parameters:
        d - Gets return date and updates the appropriate book attributes.
        Returns:
        true if student is late or book is not borrowed; false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of this book.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        representation of this book in the following format, for example, Title: Pride and Prejudice Author: Jane Austen Year: 1813, 350 pages
